name: polyflow-sdk-bundle-generator
description: Generates Polyflow SDK bundled with a given API key.

scripts.build: mkdir -p scripts && browserify scripts/injector-template.js -p esmify > public/build/polyflow-bundle.js
scripts.build-minified: mkdir -p scripts && browserify scripts/injector-template.js -p esmify | uglifyjs > public/build/polyflow-bundle.js

author: Polyflow
